name: Platform Hunter (Shaquiri1)
description:
Platform Hunter is a 2 player interactive competitive online platformer.

The players compete against each other and have to master a challenging parkour as quickly as possible. By collecting items, players have the opportunity to improve their skills or inflict damage on the opponent. They jump, run and fight their way through procedurally generated levels while searching for power-ups that grant them additional advantages like running faster or attacking the enemy. The first player to reach the goal wins the game and becomes the ultimate "Platform Hunter".

Credits for all used game assets are in the attached Credits.pdf file.

Sometimes multiplayer does not work instantly just go back to main menu and try it again.
